jdlib

Class Download

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • jdlib.Download
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Download
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.lang.Runnable
    A class for downloading files from direct links.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Download(java.net.URL url, java.lang.String saveDir)
      Creates a new download for the given URL with a "PAUSED" state.

    • Method Summary

      Cancel this download.

      Get the progress of this download.

      Get the size of this download.

      Get the URL of this download.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Download

        public Download(java.net.URL url,
        java.lang.String saveDir)
        Creates a new download for the given URL with a "PAUSED" state. The download will be saved in the given directory path.
        Parameters:
        url - The URL for this download
        saveDir - the directory to save this download

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        Start this download. Call this method only once for each new download. After pausing a download, use the resume method.

      • getURL

        public java.lang.String getURL()
        Get the URL of this download.
        Returns:
        the URL of this download as a String

      • getSize

        public long getSize()
        Get the size of this download.
        Returns:
        size of this download in bytes, or -1 if size information is unavailable

      • getProgress

        public float getProgress()
        Get the progress of this download.
        Returns:
        the completion percent of this download, or -1 if unable to calculate a progress for this download.

      • getStatus

        public java.lang.String getStatus()
        Get the status of this download.
        Returns:
        the download's status as a String which can be "Downloading", "Paused", "Complete", "canceled" or "Error".

      • pause

        public void pause()
        Pause this download.

      • resume

        public void resume()
        Resume this download.

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
        Cancel this download.

      • getMessage

        public java.lang.String getMessage()
        Get the message of this download.
        Returns:
        the message of this download as a String

      • getFileName

        public java.lang.String getFileName()
        Get the name of the file being downloaded.
        Returns:
        the file-name of this download

      • getFilePath

        public java.lang.String getFilePath()
        Get the absolute path of the download file.
        Returns:
        the absolute path of the download file

      • getSpeed

        public java.lang.String getSpeed()
        Get the average speed of this download.
        Returns:
        the average speed value properly formatted in B/s, KB/s or MB/s

      • run

        public void run()
        DON'T call this method. This is the run method of this Runnable.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
